```{r setup}

```

```{r}
nodes_and_edges <-
  ne_fetch_concept_classes(conn_fun = "pg13::local_connect()")
nodes_and_edges <-
  map_node_attributes(nodes_and_edges)
nodes_and_edges <-
  map_edge_attributes(nodes_and_edges)
final_graph <-
  construct_graph(nodes_and_edges)
final_graph$graph
```
